Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), SODIUM LAUROAMPHOACETATE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, GLYCERYL OLEATE, POPULUS TREMULOIDES (ASPEN) BARK EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, SOLUBLE FIBROIN*, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E), SODIUM ANISATE, SODIUM GLYCOLATE, HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES CITRATE

chunk:
Directions: Use immediately after opening. Each film is good for one application only. Apply film to clean, dampened skin for 20 minutes. Use once daily for four consecutive days each week to achieve optimal effect. If desired, cut film to fit your targeted areas.

Warnings: n/a
book: 2353-Michael Strahan DAILY DEFENSE HYDRATING FACE AND BEARD WASH
